concept.title: 208.7005 MILITARY INTERDEPARTMENTAL PURCHASE REQUESTS.

conbody.p: (a) PGI 253.208-1 when using DD Form 448, Military Interdepartmental Purchase Request; and
(b) PGI 253.208-2 when using DD Form 448-2, Acceptance of MIPR.
